content: in this legal case the court made a decision on april 11 2022 regarding the division of assets among three heirs the total value of the assets is 223000 euros and includes a building bank accounts unpaid pension benefits and a car each heir is entitled to onethird of the assets but adjustments were made based on an agreement the widow will receive the funds from the bank accounts and unpaid pension benefits the son will inherit half of the real estate properties and the daughter will receive the car and the remaining half of the real estate properties the courts decision was based on the inheritance act the court also determined that the deceased persons widow son and daughter are the intestate heirs and are entitled to a share of the estate the heirs need to make arrangements for the transfer of property and funds once the courts decision becomes final the appellant has 15 days to lodge an appeal with the court providing enough copies of the appeal and stating the grounds for the appeal the appeal must be comprehensible and contain all necessary information the court fee must be paid when lodging the appeal unless there are grounds for exemption or deferment

metadata.cost: 918,00 EUR compensation with inheritance value 2'230.00 EUR
